Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a wide range of features that make it stand out in its category. Considering its quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For you, I am offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $150. This is a fantastic opportunity to own a high-quality item at a competitive rate. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
